item.title: 👍💵Jodie Alberts - Bellevue Chamber of Commerce
item.description: Jodie Alberts signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Bellevue Chamber of Commerce. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Michael Shaw - Washington State Transit Association
item.description: Michael Shaw signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Transit Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Lynne Robinson - Mayor, City of Bellevue
item.description: Lynne Robinson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Mayor, City of Bellevue.
